 At the risk of being negative yet again, all I can say is --You have got =
to be friggin' kidding!? No wonder all the 'serious researchers' call it en=
tertainment, cuz shows like that put this work back with Barnum and Baily! =
I think they take urban myths, like the haunted piano, and do a show on it,=
 with all actors. Their demonolgist supposedly worked on the Amityville cas=
e, ya mean the Hollywood version, cuz the real case was nothin!?  Just watc=
h the people involved, and you can tell they are actors, with speech traini=
ng, not a single um, ah, or stutter ever uttered! It's all just too well re=
hearshed and scripted for me to watch any more of it.   Some Googele result=
s for 'haunted piano';  http://paranormal.about.com/library/blstory_august0=
4_17.htm  'YouTube - Haunted Piano Edited 



The classical version of the =
Haunted Piano is now renewed and better than ever! Again, It's a documentar=
y about a haunted house and a piano that plays by ...www.youtube.com/watch?=
v=3DaBnOXfnR7WM - 73k - Cached - Similar pages'  'Ghosts - Supernatural Mes=
sage Boards > Haunted Piano 



I have investigated a place a couple of yea=
rs ago that had a haunted piano that had been in a fire. It was very intere=
sting, the piano didn't sound right ...www.ghostvillage.com/ghostcommunity/=
lofiversion/index.php/t8231.html - 15k - Cached - Similar pages'  haunted p=
iano - Truveo Video Search



woke up nd sumone was lpayin mah piano but no=
body was there.. i was so scared..www.truveo.com/haunted-piano/id/411346454=
7 - 97k - Cached - Similar pages
